As a Vietnamese-Californian, I ... largest coffee exporter in the world, have been left behind the global sustainability push. So, I created an in home barista experience to empower anyone to easily sip pure bliss that also fits into busy lives. And, above all else, I made sure all our products are fairly and sustainably sourced, grown and packaged as much as possible. Because creating better, more equitable opportunities in Vietnam is why I started Copper Cow ...

t: Vietnamese Coffee: Copper Cow Coffee Review - Forbes Vetted
s: September 28, 2023 - When it comes to shopping for Copper Cow Coffee, the brand has a direct-to-consumer retail site that offers a subscription model for regular coffee drinkers (starting at $35 per shipment), or you can place a one-time order for individual coffee bundles, creamers, teas and lattes. Copper Cow Coffee is also available on Amazon...

t: Why Copper Cow Coffee Is Great (My Honest Review) | The Kitchn
s: July 11, 2023 - Now, there are plenty of reasons to support this brand (women- and AAPI-owned, hello!), but at the end of the day (or start, because you know, coffee in the morning), it’s just plain delicious coffee to keep in your pantry.
